name: Chili Caramel Chicken Noodle Salad
keywords: Chili Caramel Chicken Noodle Salad, Spicy, Asian, Chicken, Dinner, Noodles, Chicken Thighs, Chili Caramel Glaze, Rice Noodles, Vegetables, Coriander, Salad, Summer, Easy, Quick, One-Pan, Family Friendly, Healthy, Flavorful, Lunch
description: Delightfully sweet and spicy noodle salad with chili caramel chicken, perfect for a summer meal.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your vegetables by cutting them up for later use.
recipeInstructions.name: Prep Vegetables

recipeInstructions.text: Boil water and soak the rice noodles according to package instructions.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak Noodles

recipeInstructions.text: In a frying pan, cook the diced chicken thighs over high heat until nicely browned and cooked through.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook Chicken

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chili caramel glaze to the cooked chicken and stir to coat evenly.
recipeInstructions.name: Glaze Chicken

recipeInstructions.text: Plate the rice noodles and top with the chili caramel chicken. Add the prepared vegetables and garnish with coriander. Add some more glaze as desired and enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Assemble Salad

notes: This salad is a great way to use leftover cooked chicken.
Feel free to customize the vegetables based on your preferences or what you have on hand.
